title: Compat Title Installer
author: TheLordScruffy
description: Install the Homebrew Channel to the vWii Menu from Wii U Mode.
details:
Install a channel to the vWii Menu from Wii U Mode. In its current state, it simply installs the Homebrew Channel.

Credits to:

- Dimok, smealum, others for iosuhax and Mocha CFW.
- FIX94, this repo is largely based off of wuphax.

source code: https://github.com/TheLordScruffy/vwii-compat-installer
